sentences.en: ...the family's ancestral home in southern Germany.
All the Pomoideae were allopolyploids drived from a doubled hybrid between two remote ancestral types.
sentences.cn: 所有的梨亚科是由两个远缘祖先类型双杂交演化的异源多倍体.

sentences.en: Ancestral worship has long been at the heart of Orcish religion.
sentences.cn: 祖先的崇拜之物已经深深的植根语兽人的宗教之中.

sentences.en: Foshan is important because of its Ancestral Temple and its handicrafts.
sentences.cn: 佛山有名是因为这里的佛山祖庙和手工艺品.

sentences.en: Ghazi is to be buried in his ancestral village in Punjab province.
sentences.cn: 加齐将被葬在旁遮普省他的老家.

sentences.en: His ancestral home is in France.
His veins were full of ancestral blood that was rotten with this sort of unconscious brutality.
sentences.cn: 他的血管里,充满了祖代传留的,由于这种不自觉的残忍而腐朽的血液.

sentences.en: I thought of the night when I first came to his ancestral home, three months before.
sentences.cn: 于是我联想起三个月前我初次来他的古色古香的别墅的那个晚上.

sentences.en: Many travel to their ancestral homelands to renew ties with their kin.
sentences.cn: 不少人因此回到祖籍老家和宗亲们重新建立起宗族关系.

sentences.en: SE Asian jungle fowl considered ancestral to domestic fowl.
sentences.cn: 东南亚原鸡,被认为是家禽的祖先.

sentences.en: South American cavy; possibly ancestral to the domestic guinea pig.
sentences.cn: 南美洲豚鼠; 可能是家养豚鼠的祖先.

sentences.en: The ancestral prescription is said to be efficacious against renal weakness.
sentences.cn: 祖传的医方据说对于治疗肾虚效果很好.

sentences.en: The terror bird was the top predator in its ancestral home.
sentences.cn: 恐鸟是其远古家园中的顶级捕食者.

sentences.en: Translate the Imperial College , temple , Wen Tianxiang ancestral temple.
sentences.cn: 翻译国子监, 孔庙, 文天祥祠.

sentences.en: Understand that it is important to ascend into one's own ancestral DNA.
sentences.cn: 要明白,提升到自身祖先中的DNA是非常重要的.

sentences.en: You have to bear up under the hospitality of the ancestral home for two years.
sentences.cn: 你还得再忍耐两年,接受老家的款待.

words.tran_cn: 女性祖先；女性被继承人

trans.tran_cn: 祖先的，与祖先有关的，祖宗传下的
trans.tran_en: You use ancestral to refer to a person's family in former times, especially when the family is important and has property or land that they have had for a long time
